PHRASE.LANG: A Shiba-breed dog that is always happily wagging its tail.\nThis pup will try its best to follow its master.[#Legal]
Un chien de race shiba qui remue toujours gentiment la queue.\nCe chiot fera de son mieux pour suivre son maître.[#Legal]
Ein in Shiba gezüchteter Hund, der immer fröhlich mit seinem Schwanz wedelt.\n Dieser Welpe versucht sein bestes, um seinem Besitzer zu folgen. [#Legal]
Uno Shiba Inu che scodinzola sempre allegramente.\nQuesto cane segue costantemente il proprio padrone.[#Legal]
Perro de raza Shiba que no deja de mover la cola.\nEste cachorro siempre seguirá a su amo.[#Legal]
うれしそうに尻尾を振り続ける柴犬。\n一生懸命主人の後をついていきます。[#Legal]
기쁜 듯이 쉼없이 꼬리를 치는 시바견. \n열심히 주인을 따라갑니다.[#Legal]
A Wagging shiba-dog.\nIt follows its master by all means. [#Legal]
高興地不停搖擺尾巴的柴犬。\n從一而終跟隨主人。[#Legal]
高興地不停搖擺尾巴的柴犬。\n從一而終跟隨主人。[#Legal]
A Shiba-breed dog that is always happily wagging its tail.\nThis pup will try its best to follow its master.[#Legal]
